Rinji has the special ability to produce ultrasonic waves and understand them. This way he can talk with [[bats]], who use ultrasonic waves for communication. He is able to give them orders, like to search the area around him, and they seem to consider him a friend. He can use these bats to release powerful [[Bat Controlling: Ultrasonic Mind Waves|sonic waves]].
